name: Joint Polish Investment Fund
description: The Joint Polish Investment Fund, ("JPIF") is a new Life Science Venture Capital Fund, which focuses on investments in Life Science companies with visible and near-term value inflection points and a prospective holding period of 3-5 years. JPIF consists of a team of people with broad experience in the life-science sector. Scientists and medical doctors with industrial experience work hand in glove with colleagues who have a thorough training in economics and business affairs. Everybody is driven by true interest in the life science field and new technologies, which will greatly contribute to people’s health disease management and quality of life. Entrepreneurs backed by JPIF have access to the knowledge and advice of each member of the JPIF team and to the associated global scientific and commercial network. Together JPIF and entrepreneurs are therefore in the position to accelerate preclinical, clinical or commercial development and a successful market entry into the most important healthcare markets: Europe, the U.S., and Asia.
investmentAreas: Life Science, Medical Technology, Mobile / Personalized Health, Diagnostics, and Drug Development

name: Navivo Capital
description: We are a Venture Capital fund supporting European tech companies in their global expansion. We focus on companies with a global product, global ambitions, and an amazing team to deliver on these ambitions. We focus on early growth stage (late seed, Series A and B) Our team combines investment (top 10% track record with 20+ exits) and entrepreneurial experience of multiple start-ups and scaling global companies
investmentAreas: Fintech, Real Estate, E-Commerce, B2B, HRtech, SaaS

name: Nunatak Capital
description: Based in Warsaw, Poland, Nunatak Capital is an early-growth and seed stage Venture Capital Fund focused on the European market. Nunatak Capital was created for startups that face complex challenges and constraints as they pursue their visionary projects. Our data science expertise and belief in entrepreneurship and innovation allow us to support ambitious teams in creating unique solutions. We invest in Teams that base the value of the startups they build on Data Science solutions. We are looking not only for startups that create new technologies, but also those that use existing technology to build the potential of their products. We invest wherever Data Science is used and where technology creates the unique value proposition. The startup development stage does not restrain us, but we are most willing to invest in companies that can prove that their solution is adjusted to market needs.
investmentAreas: Data Science, Data Analytics, Data Optimisation

name: Radix Ventures
description: Radix is a new Venture Capital Fund established by experienced investors and technology entrepreneurs based in Central and Eastern Europe with the mission to empower radical innovations.
investmentAreas: DeepTech, Energy, Renewables, DevOps

name: Freya Capital
description: Freya Capital is a venture capital fund supporting and financing innovative businesses making an impact on tomorrow’s world. We invest up to EUR 1 million in early-stage companies with high growth potential and international scaling ambitions.
investmentAreas: Marketplaces, AR, VR, HRtech, EV solutions, Food & Beverage

name: Accelero Ventures
description: Accelero Ventures was established with the Polish Development Fund and private investors. The funds invested by PFR Ventures come from the Starter program. We invest amounts up to PLN 4 million to increase the equity of companies at the pre-seed, seed or series A rund. We focus on technology companies in the area of CleanTech, BioTech, FMCG and IT / ICT, whose innovative projects will qualify as the so-called disruptive innovations.
investmentAreas: CleanTech, BioTech, FMCG and IT

name: Atmos Ventures
description: Atmos' mission is to invest in world class founders, who are motivated to solve the world's most challenging issues, through the use of cutting edge technologies and a data driven approach. Atmos backs innovative teams that have cracked complex scientific problems, entrepreneurs who have commercialized their expertise, companies that are indispensable to their clients and management that understands the markets they serve. Atmos partners with teams working to build these enterprises into category leaders.
investmentAreas: Robotics&Automation, Quantum Computing, AI, Infrastructure & Cloud, Hardware, IoT, Web3

name: Cogito Capital Partners
description: Cogito Capital Partners is a venture capital firm based in Warsaw, Poland and New York, USA. We partner with ambitious entrepreneurs and support growth of later-stage B2B tech companies with CEE footprint and products & services that have potential to scale globally and transform the key 3 sectors: Enterprise software, Fintech and Healthtech.
investmentAreas: Enterprise Software, Healthtech, Fintech

name: WP2 Investments
description: WP2 Investments is a venture capital and venture building fund. We actively invest in scalable businesses in the areas of fintech, impact & tech (medtech, sporttech, edutech) and green energy. All of our investments are based solely on the private funds of the founders and the freedom of investment policy that goes with it. What distinguishes us in the market is ScaleUP - a proprietary program supporting portfolio companies in effective development and achievement of business goals.
investmentAreas: fintech, greentech, impact tech

name: Ragnarson
description: Ragnarson was founded in 2006 as a small development studio that helps European startups build their software products. Over the years, we have delivered more than 60 projects, generated more than €16M in revenues, and invested in 10 startups. At Ragnarson, we specialize in supporting climate tech startups by facilitating their financing and product development. We also assist SMEs in achieving their sustainability objectives through our tailored web and mobile software solutions. Notably, 40% of our profit is reinvested in early stage impact-driven startups. What we provide: - Up to €50.000 cash investment - Up to €50.000 worth of software development services - Alignment of business, fundraising, and product goals - Entrepreneurial mentor and sparring partner - Software development teams Who are we looking for: - Early-stage with an MVP or pre-product - Software is an integral part of their solution - A positive impact on the world is as important as becoming a profitable organization - Europe-based
investmentAreas: climate tech, software

name: Spinaker alfa
description: SPINAKER alfa is a seed capital fund focused on early stage projects. We help startups validate their business ideas, products and connect them with industry partners during commercialization phase. We are interested in R&D projects and new companies with unique technologies. SPINAKER alfa is partnered by National Centre for Research and Development as a part of BRIdge Alfa program, providing VC financing for R&D projects, innovative SMEs.
investmentAreas: FinTech, CleanTech, HealthTech, ICT, and other industries

name: FIDIASZ
description: Fidiasz ASI is a VC/PE fund created by Krzysztof Domarecki, founder of the Selena Group and co-creator of its international success. The concept of the fund is simple: we combine business experience from many markets with the experience of executives from various industries and the business ideas of innovators and creators of new technologies. We want to co-create the best and most innovative Polish products and solutions and introduce them to international markets.
investmentAreas: fintech,energy ,bio-agro

name: Xplorer Fund
description: Xplorer Fund invests in pre-seed and seed technology projects. Alongside with The Polish National Centre for Research and Development (NCBiR) we invest up to 250k EUR per project, within the Innovation Program Bridge Alfa. Our main focus is technologies of ICT and (I)IOT and their applications through different business verticals e.g. MedTech, New Mobility or Digital Industries.
investmentAreas: Fintech, Health Care, Internet of Things, mHealth, Nanotechnology, Seed Tech

name: Carlson ASI EVIG Alfa VC Fund
description: Carlson EVIG Alfa is a venture capital fund established in partnership with Carlson Ventures International Limited. The purpose of the fund is to support investments in technology projects at an early stage of development, with research and development character and global potential. It focuses on key industries for a modern knowledge-based economy, with particular emphasis on devices operating within the Internet of Things and dedicated to such areas as FinTech, MedTech and CleanTech
investmentAreas: B2B, B2C, CleanTech, FinTech, Internet of Things, Medical Device, SaaS, Venture Capital

name: YouNick Mint
description: We specialize in supporting visionary ventures during their formative phases, backing the brightest ideas that hold the potential to redefine industries. Our focus is on partnering with ambitious teams that are at the forefront of technological advancement. YouNick is an unique technology park where people come first – the employer, employee, scientist, and innovation originator.
investmentAreas: Advanced Materials, Biotechnology, Food and Beverage, Health Care, Industrial, Internet of Things

name: ERC
description: We are early stage investor in R&D startups with investment ticket up to 250k EUR funded under NCBR Bridge Alfa programme together with PGE Ventures as our investor partner
investmentAreas: IoT, Robotics, Food, Autonomous Vehicles, DeepTech

name: EKIPA Investments
description: EKIPA ASI is a company that brings a new dimension to investments by challenging conventional beliefs and ideas. They specialize in providing information about projects, conducting internal team analysis, performing initial verification etc.Our mission is to support entrepreneurs in implementing their unconventional ideas . We strive to achieve financial success, but it is equally important for us to educate, inspire and help create value for the entire startup ecosystem.
investmentAreas: Consumer, EdTech

name: Corvus Ventures
description: Corvus Ventures is an early-stage venture capital fund focused on CEE. We invest in fast-growing young tech projects managed by exceptional entrepreneurs. Our primary focus is on internet, mobile and information technology related projects. We like XaaS and marketplace business models but we will consider others businesses, as well. We invest early and are keen to be your first institutional investor, although some traction is needed.
investmentAreas: Marketplaces, SaaS, Energy, Mental Health

name: bValue Fund
description: bValue Fund is a specialised growth equity investment firm that partners with tech and tech-enabled businesses in Central and Eastern Europe. The Fund is investing across 2 distinctive strategies seed and growth always aligning its interest with outstanding founders. The firm manages 100m EUR growth equity fund which is a leading source of growth capital for ambitious entrepreneurs in CEE, investing 5-15m EUR in single investment. We offer regional category leaders looking for international growth a unique combination of strategic and tactical support.
investmentAreas: SaaS, Healthcare, E-Commerce, AI

name: Y Experiment
description: Y Experiment Yx is a startup studio specializing in building cutting-edge hi-tech products and providing IT expertise to startups and investors. They focus on validating opportunities, creating minimum viable products, and supporting the global startup. Y Experiment is a startup studio focused on hi-tech products and support of the global startup ecosystem
investmentAreas: IoT, VR, Industry 4.0, IT Services, IT Consulting

name: Brave Venture Capital
description: BRAVE Venture Capital is a group of funds investing in dynamically developing ventures at an early stage of development with global aspirations. Our investment horizon is from 4 to 14 years. We are interested in solutions in the area of: Internet, IoT & hardware, RES and Life Science, with particular emphasis on: MedTech and BioTech. Our fund is the founder of BRAVE Seed Fund, operator of WARMIA I MAZUR CAPITAL FUND and KUJAWSKO-POMORSKIE FUNDUSZ KAPITAŁOWEGO, which are a joint venture of Bank Gospodarstwa Krajowego and a group of private investors. Key employees of BRAVE Venture Capital have successfully completed dozens of investments, including the co-creation and management of Seed Funds, one of the most recognizable funds supporting innovative start-ups in Poland.
investmentAreas: Mobile Apps, Software, SaaS, Fintech, Crypto

name: 4growth VC
description: 4growth VC is a VC fund investing in technologies. We invest in technologies in areas where we can bring the most non-financial value (smart money) to portfolio companies. Contact us with your business idea and explore the Venture Capital sector.
investmentAreas: E-Commerce, MedTech, Machine Learning, Healthcare

name: Assay Group
description: Assay is an independent investment fund that invests in startups redefining everyday products and services, minimizing risks and maximizing profits through market-driven initiatives.We also provide business consulting services for entities that are interested in optimization and dynamic acceleration. Our goal is to invest in young, promising companies and support their development in a way that allows for maximizing operational competitiveness on the Polish and international market. First and foremost, we are interested in innovative and non-secondary solutions implemented in areas with high growth potential. Thanks to comprehensive and active support of the Portfolio, we strive to achieve rates of return that are rarely seen on the market.
investmentAreas: Electromobility, Apps, Software, Health, Biotech, Retail, Cybersecurity

name: AIP Seed
description: Our goal is to be the first investor in top CEE startups. Get in touch if you are at day one of building a global tech company. With more than 110 investments, AIP Seed is the largest fund in Poland and among the largest in CEE.
investmentAreas: HRtech, Proptech, EdTech, FoodTech, Beauty, Circular Economy

name: Altamira
description: We named Altamira (meaning ‘aim high' in Spanish) after the famous cave that houses prehistoric paintings. For us, it is a symbol of the power and creativity of the human mind, reaching back millennia. As an equity investor and partner in company development, we cooperate with teams who demonstrate the ambition to achieve technological breakthroughs in their fields. We expect this to translate into significant revenue potential from international markets. We invest our money, time, competence, and contacts - and we only get involved where there is the potential for true partnership and cooperation with a company's founders. We are interested in modern technology that finds a practical use in physical – not virtual – reality, mostly employed for industrial production in the chemical, pharmaceutical, or medical device industries.
investmentAreas: CleanTech, Chemical, Pharma, MedTech

name: Aligo Venture Capital
description: We support #HealthTech and #CleanTech innovators at every stage of building and developing valuable companies using innovative technologies with global potential. We invest 0.2-1 M Euro. We support entrepreneurs and technologies that matter.
investmentAreas: Biotechnology, Energy, Health Care, Life Science

name: Online Venture
description: Online Venture is a collective of talented programmers, SEO specialists and content creators. We create comprehensive solutions. We manage websites with high traffic and invest in promising ventures in the online industry. We have the ambition to reach tens of millions of Polish and foreign Internet users with a quality product.
investmentAreas: Marketplaces, Media websites, Internet, Mobile, Sport, SEO

name: SpeedUp Energy Innovation
description: SpeedUp Energy Innovation was created thanks to the partnership of PGE Ventures, PFR Ventures, the National Center for Research and Development (NCBR) and SpeedUp Group. The fund invests in companies in the growth and market expansion phase, especially those looking for opportunities to enter and scale their operations on foreign markets. The SpeedUp Energy Innovation investment ticket is EUR 1 million with the possibility of a so-called follow-on of up to EUR 4 million. The investment target is companies from industries and sectors that are at least 80% within the area of ​​interest of the PGE Capital Group, as well as companies that go beyond the investment strategy in max. 20%, but are characterized by particularly impressive operating results. By establishing cooperation with the fund, you gain not only financing of up to PLN 20 million, but also a solid and experienced partner who will support your company's operations in the long term and help it enter the next stages of development, as well as obtain the financing needed to implement them.
investmentAreas: information technology, energy, climate tech

name: Pomerangels ASI S.A.
description: POMERANGELS is specially designed to invest alongside business angels and syndicates. We back high potential Poland-based businesses together with strong group or syndicate of private angel investors who are looking to make a good commercial investment. Our fund is specially designed to invest alongside business angels and syndicates. The fund invests across Poland and will consider proposals for businesses at all stages of development, with main focus on post-revenue stage.
investmentAreas: MedTech, Consumer Eletronics, ICT, Autonomous technologies, New materials, Biotech

name: Scanderia Venture
description: By investing capital, we put our knowledge and heart into all our projects. The team of experts of the Scanderia Venture fund consists of several dozens years of experience gathered in business practice, which now support the creators of ideas in which we believe. Everyone, even the best businesses, have been beginners at some point and we know that it is not easy to start. On the way from idea to product, we can meet at the idea stage, because our specialty is supporting projects at an early stage. Together with innovators, we develop, improve and introduce them to the market.
investmentAreas: BioTech and MedTech

name: SATUS Starter
description: SATUS Starter is a venture capital focused on seed and series A investments between $ 100-1M in in Central and Eastern Europe. We are interested in AI & Big Data, SaaS, AR & VR, Industry 4.0, FinTech, blockchain, cybersecurity and marketplace startups.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Big Data, Blockchain, Cyber Security, FinTech, Impact Investing, Internet of Things, Marketplace, SaaS, Virtual Reality

name: Precapital
description: Precapital is a private investment fund with a mission to revitalize underutilized urban areas through building renovations and promoting interesting and aesthetically pleasing architecture. They support the growth of young companies. Private investment fund with a focus on real estate, technology and renewable energy.
investmentAreas: Real estate, Technology, Renewable energy, Investment Management

name: RKKVC
description: RKKVC is part of a single-family office. The fund is based in Warsaw, Poland, but invests throughout Europe and the United States. Our main focus is on software companies, mainly deep tech and B2B SaaS, but we are flexible and open to breakthrough companies from other areas. RKKVC is founder-oriented. The investment team actively supports its portfolio companies with its network and previous entrepreneurial experience throughout every stage of the founders' journey.
investmentAreas: Mobility, SpaceTech, Robotics, AR, Computer Vision, AI, Cybersecurity, Hospitality, DeepTech, Healthcare, Retail

name: Prometeia Capital
description: Prometeia Capital specializes in securing financing for businesses, capital transactions, and capital market advisory. They assist in achieving long-term goals, invest in promising projects, and provide a range of financial services. Prometeia Capital is an advisory and investment company specializing in obtaining financing for enterprises, capital transactions and advisory services in the broadly understood capital market. We help to achieve long-term goals, invest in promising business projects and support companies in implementing their strategies.
investmentAreas: Electrical, Mechanical engineering, Information technology, Telecommunications, Energy

name: Netrix Ventures
description: Netrix Ventures is an entrepreneurial, early-stage impact investing and acceleration firm. Our philosophy has been grounded in the belief that businesses can make a significant and positive contribution to people, society and the environment. We understand the scope of value-add venture investing from start-up to acquisition, merger or IPO because we've sat on both sides of the table. Our passion to make a difference, our desire to help others, our entrepreneurial spirit and our hands-on investment expertise are just some of the reasons talented entrepreneurs have sought to partner with us for the experience, strategy and vision we continue to bring to every investment.
investmentAreas: Healthcare, MedTech

name: MedVenture
description: MedVenture is a venture capital fund investing in MedTech projects in the area of research and development with global potential. The fund's investment budget is PLN 40 million. MedVenture offers extensive smart money support for teams, including know-how, relationships and partnerships in the MedTech area as well as in the areas of IT, international marketing, law, finance, research, development and global scaling.
investmentAreas: BioTech and MedTech

name: mAccelerator.vc
description: mAccelerator.vc is a venture capital fund with over €50 million under management focusing mainly on early-stage tech investments. Born in Poland, we invest across Europe in SaaS, cybersecurity, automation, digital marketing, and e-commerce companies. We provide entrepreneurs with expertise and insights in scalling, market intelligence, business development as well as marketing and brand-building. Born in 2017, mAccelerator.vc is supported by our track-record in innovation and business building at mBank - the world's leading digital bank with over 5 million clients.
investmentAreas: technology and digital economy

name: Renaissance Partners
description: The Renaissance Group began its operations in Central Europe in 1994. Its roots, however, date back to the late 1950s, when Franklin Pitch Johnson, as one of the forerunners, through his investment activities in the USA, defined a new financial industry called Venture Capital . After the political transformation in Central Europe, a group of experienced businessmen, with Johnson's support, established the European Renaissance Capital Fund, which - together with associated entities - was one of the first to start investment operations in Poland, the Czech Republic and Slovakia. The year 2000, with the establishment of the second Fund, European Renaissance Capital II, brought further development to the Renaissance Group.
investmentAreas: New technologies, IT, Medical projects, Energy, Environmental protection

name: Invento VC
description: At Invento VC, we believe that we all have an impact. By partnering with entrepreneurs, we help them develop, refine and market their ideas and innovative products. We make sure that with our experience, knowledge and business contacts, they respond to needs, find the best solutions, conquer new markets and build an international advantage. This is how we change our world for the better every day. At Invento VC, we create a space where people and their ideas meet, along with finance, experience, science and business. Together we create, solutions that could never have been created if even one of these elements were missing.
investmentAreas: fintech, deep tech, food tech, med tech, web3

name: Infini VC
description: Infini invests in early-stage R&D projects with high potential of market commercialization. We are mainly interested in projects in these industries: - Chemical Engineering, Biomedical Materials - Biotechnology and Pharmaceuticals - Nanotechnology, composite materials - Energy and the environmental protection, renewable energy, recycling and energy-efficient technologies - Electronics (optoelectronics, telecommunications) - Cybernetics (computer science, cryptology) - Mechatronics (Automation & Robotics) - B2B IT (especially high-tech communication devices and algorithms for closer human-computer interaction, decision support systems) - Aviation (aircraft and unmanned vehicles) - Mechanical engineering
investmentAreas: software, internet & consumer technology

name: Xevin Investments
description: We are a Polish private venture capital fund specializing in new technologies and the internet. We conduct various types of investment activities. Our fund is interested in companies and projects that are at the initial stage of development and cannot achieve further business goals due to the lack of capital, and those that are developing, need investments to implement further milestones.
investmentAreas: MarTech, AdTech, FinTech, EdTech, SaaS B2B/B2C, E-commerce

name: SATUS
description: SATUS is a Group of entities managing seed and venture capital funds. The SATUS business profile is focused in particular on innovative companies in the early development phase, characterized by the highest rate of return, but also the highest risk and simultaneous focus of all organizational and financial activities on reducing investment risk. The implementation of financing of innovative projects without industry restrictions is possible thanks to the synergy of activities between SATUS, scientific units and investors. The group combines the potential and advantages of VC funds, seed capital funds and the traditional network of business angels.
investmentAreas: Artificial intelligence, Big data, SaaS, Artificial reality, Cybersecurity

name: Impera Alfa
description: Impera Alfa is a venture capital company investing in innovative projects with unique technologies, supporting strategy development and international market entry.Impera Alfa Alternatywna Spółka Inwestycyjna is a venture capital fund managed by three partners who invest in R&D projects with the support of the National Centre for Research and Development under the BRIdge Alfa programme.
investmentAreas: E-Commerce, Biotech, Energy, Developer Tools

name: Simpact Ventures
description: At Simpact Ventures we manage funds of PLN 130M. Simpact 1.0 was the first impact investment microVC in Poland looking for innovative, tech startups that generates positive social or/and environmental impact. Now with Simpact 2.0 backed by European Investment Fund we are looking for the best impact driven startups in CEE and wider. We empower founders to build tech companies that combine profit with purpose. We believe that the impact which startup creates for the society represents the degree to which it solves actual problems and at the same time is the best indicator of its future financial performance.
investmentAreas: MedTech, Security, FoodTech, AI/ML, AR/VR, Impact investing

name: Unfold.vc
description: Unfold.vc is a Wrocław-based venture capital fund focused on providing financial support for technological projects that have great potential for success, at various stages of development. We have been active on the market since 2008, and our team consists of competent and committed professionals with in-depth knowledge and many years of experience working on projects in various fields of technology. We invest in projects at various stages of development. The initial investment in a project usually ranges between EUR 100,000 to EUR 200,000. We participate in subsequent investment rounds, and our maximum commitment to date has been over EUR 1 million.
investmentAreas: Biotechnology, Manufacturing, Mobile Games, Agtech, HRtech

name: GTTechnologies
description: The Fund operates within the BRIdgeAlfa Programme, financing research projects undertaken by young and innovative enterprises. The financing provided by the Fund is of a mixed nature and includes a component of equity financing from the Fund's private investors and a component of grant financing from the National Centre for Research and Development. The Fund’s activities are undertaken in close cooperation with the National Centre for Research and Development, which has its representative on the Fund’s Investment Committee.
investmentAreas: Life Sciences, MedTech, BioTech, Diagnostics, Automotive

name: VCLink
description: VC Link is a venture capital fund looking for promising and innovative projects and companies, related to, among others, broadly understood: • modern materials; • solutions for the energy sector; • automation and robotization; • software for industry; • solutions for ICT We stand out on the investment fund market with a good understanding of technology and the ability to support technological projects. At the same time, we are looking for innovative and competitive solutions on a global scale. For projects that gain our interest, we will be able to provide up to EUR 250,000 in financing, business and substantive support, assistance in obtaining further rounds of financing, strategic partners and potential customers. Our goal is to find and support technologies that have the potential to change the face of the future world. We believe that together we are able to create something big. We will help selected originators to refine the project strategy, its implementation and commercialization.
investmentAreas: Electronics, Information Services, Information Technology, Manufacturing, Medical

name: Green Ventures
description: Greenventures is a passionate company that supports innovative ideas through assessing their potential and providing funding for research and development until the commercial phase. They promote the diffusion of technological innovations.Green Ventures is open to proposals to establish cooperation with institutional investors who are interested in supporting the further development of innovative enterprises (second round of financing).
investmentAreas: Medtech, healthtech

name: VIGO Ventures
description: VIGO Ventures is an investment group supporting cutting edge R&D photonic teams in technology development and commercialization. We make early stage photonics companies ready for round A investment. We are a part of a larger ecosystem and offer long term business support for our portfolio companies which, includes possible next round financing. We light speed your way to round A. With a photonics and hardware focus we offer investment up to €1,5 mln and a possible growth financing up to €10 mln.
investmentAreas: Advanced Materials, CleanTech, Hardware, Health Care, Laser, Optical Communication

name: FundingBox Deep Tech Fund
description: FundingBox Deep Tech Fund finances early-stage European companies with a clearly defined technological advantage. Primarily our focus will be on your TEAM. Then, we look at the scalability potential of your IDEA. We are also excited to learn about your TECHNOLOGICAL competitive advantage. No revenue yet? That doesn't discourage us, but we do expect to see a user-verified prototype. And yes, at some point we will ask you about your revenue projections. We are also open to co-investments.
investmentAreas: DeepTech, HRtech, SaaS, Healthcare

name: Warsaw Equity Group
description: Warsaw Equity Group (WEG) is an independent Warsaw-based private equity / venture capital firm focused on market investments up to €10m, targeting companies offering innovative B2B solutions in the High-Tech/Industry 4.0 and CleanTech space. With a >20-year track record of successfully empowering business ventures, we use our own capital, expertise and network to be a supportive partner to our portfolio companies and maximise growth. Our mission is to create market leaders by fulfilling ambitions of businesses we invest in. The WEG team is passionate about investing and maximising the human capital and operational potential of our portfolio companies.
investmentAreas: 3D Printing, Augmented Reality, Big Data, Cyber Security, Industrial Automation, Internet of Things

name: Tangent Line Ventures
description: Tangent Line provides capital and business partners for breakthrough industrial technology startups. We always act as a co-investor with private investors – the investor network is of paramount importance. Our investement focus are high-tech sectors: Industry-focused (automation, new processes and products), New materials (chemistry, energy), Hard technology (electronics, robotics), Life sciences (food, biotech, medtech, environemental tech), Software & IT (cybersec, industry digitalization).
investmentAreas: MedTech, AI, Sustainability

name: National Capital Fund
description: Krajowy Fundusz Kapitałowy SA is the first Polish venture capital fund of funds. The KFK's activity consists of investing in venture capital funds that provide capital to small and medium-sized Polish enterprises, especially innovative enterprises with high development potential or conducting research and development activities. So far, KFK, together with private investors, has co-created 17 venture capital funds that have supported slightly over 200 innovative enterprises operating in Poland and around the world. As of December 31, 2019, the National Capital Fund has become part of PFR Ventures.
investmentAreas: Fund of funds, Financial Services, Venture Capital, Sustainable investing, Funding

name: Sunfish Partners
description: Looking for the next Zlotycorn! Sunfish Partners is an early stage VC that invests in Polish deep tech startups with global ambitions. They are on the lookout for the next Zlotycorn, focusing on building a portfolio of innovative companies,
investmentAreas: AI, Machine Learning, MedTech, Biotech, Pharma, Healthcare

name: Kogito Ventures
description: Kogito Ventures is CEE-focused early-stage VC fund operating in a venture-on-demand model. We build syndicates with Angel Investors and often co-invest with other Venture Capital funds. Ticket size ranges from PLN 0.5m to PLN 2m, and we can follow-on with up to PLN 4m per company in total. We can participate in rounds starting from Pre-Seed to Series A. Kogito Ventures participates in the Biznest programme run by Polish Development Fund and has been allocated funding of PLN 30m, which will be matched with another PLN 30m coming from co-investing Business Angels.
investmentAreas: AI, Machine Learning, E-Commerce, Wellness

name: TERRA seed
description: TERRA seed is created by a close-knit team of professionals with many years of experience gained at the intersection of new technologies, healthcare and finance. We bring not only capital to our cooperation with selected innovators, but above all substantive support and established relationships. Our ecosystem – created to maximize the probability of success – includes recognized experts, leading universities, and business partners interested in developing innovations.
investmentAreas: Software, Diagnostics, Computer Vision, MedTech, Industry 4.0

name: Innovation Nest
description: Innovation Nest is a European VC firm specializing in early-stage B2B software investments across Europe. They support high-tech companies with seed and venture funding, focusing on Software as a Service (SaaS) companies to accelerate growth. We believe Europe has a lot to offer. European engineering talent and product intuition are amazing. We back fierce leaders and teams with big ambitions, strong personalities, and thorough market expertise.
investmentAreas: Healthcare, Analytics, E-Commerce, Agtech, HRtech, Fintech

name: TDJ Pitango Ventures
description: We invest using the smart money formula in projects with global potential. Get financing for your startup and develop under the supervision of our experts!TDJ is a family-owned firm that focuses on building long-term value through investments in Equity, Venture, Estate, Finance, and Foundation sectors.
investmentAreas: E-Commerce, AI, Big Data, Machine Learning
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Invento Capital
description: At Invento VC, we believe that we all have an impact. By partnering with entrepreneurs, we help them develop, refine and market their ideas and innovative products. We make sure that with our experience, knowledge and business contacts, they respond to needs, find the best solutions, conquer new markets and build an international advantage. This is how we change our world for the better every day. At Invento VC, we create a space where people and their ideas meet, along with finance, experience, science and business.
investmentAreas: EdTech, Robotics, Cybersecurity, Biotech, SaaS

name: Vinci
description: Vinci is a subsidiary of Bank Gospodarstwa Krajowego. Its business is to manage alternative investment companies that provide appropriate solutions in the field of financing Polish entrepreneurs. Our goal is to retain ownership of innovative technologies and patents in Poland and to commercialize them in Poland and abroad. Vinci SA manages three funds: HiTech ASI, which provides capital to technology companies at various levels of development, Da Gama ASI, which finances the internationalization processes of Polish enterprises, and IQ ASI, which invests in research and scientific projects at early stages of development.
investmentAreas: BioTech and MedTech,Finanace

name: RST Ventures For Earth
description: RST Ventures For Earth is a technology VC fund. VFE invests in projects around Industry 4.0 and IoT that contribute to wiser society: - Industrial automation/ robotics - Internet of Things - Software & hardware platforms - Smart solutions that contribute to wiser society. - Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
investmentAreas: Medtech, E-Commerce, AI, HRtech, Healthtech

name: Tar Heel Capital Pathfinder
description: Tar Heel Capital Pathfinder is a venture capital fund and an experienced venture builder, co-creating thriving global tech businesses. We invest in early stage projects focused on innovative industries and emerging technologies. As the Pathfinder Group, we have made a total of 60+ investments. We currently have 40+ projects in our portfolio, including 20+ built in the venture building model. We have enabled growth of bold businesses with international reach (RemoteMyApp, PlumResearch, GRID).
investmentAreas: Big Data, Bioinformatics, Cloud Computing, eSports, Gaming, Marketing Automation, Medical, Virtual Goods

name: Hedgehog Fund
description: Hedgehog Fund is a business angels fund investing in Polish and CEE technological startups with regional or global perspectives. We invest at seed and early stage for minority shares. Our investors (partners) have the opportunity to invest in our projects via the fund as well as directly. Our investment scope includes wide variety of technological projects with special interest of SaaS, B2B and IoT projects. We build small portfolio (up to 10 projects) of projects and we are strongly involved in the development sharing our know-how, contacts and sometimes helping with our resources.
investmentAreas: SaaS, B2B, IoT, Business angel fund, Early stage investments, Seed investments

name: Alfabeat
description: Welcome to Alfabeat, a specialist seed and early stage venture capital fund focused on Enterprise SaaS companies from Central and Eastern Europe, backed by successful enterprise software founders. We invest at seed stage, and that means a product, technology and early revenue from a large enterprise customer. Our initial ticket is €0.25-1M. We believe in Europe, focus on Central and Eastern Europe, and support making a global impact. We support experienced, entrepreneurial, courageous and globally minded founder teams.
investmentAreas: B2B, Enterprise Software, SaaS

name: Daftcode
description: Daftcode is a Polish venture builder creating cutting-edge web and mobile applications, supporting early-stage startups with innovative technologies. We create and launch our own startup projects, from concept stages, through development and up to market launch. We develop tech startups, based on our ideas, research and know-how. On repeat. We co-founded and invested in numerous businesses serving customers worldwide.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Big Data, Business Development, Business Intelligence, EdTech, SaaS

name: Dirlango
description: At Dirlango we use technology to create new business models and change things. We particularly like market places and products that seamlessly integrate the online and offline Worlds. Currently the Dirlango Group includes the Netsprint Group, iTaxi, Justwifi and Virgin Mobile Polska.
investmentAreas: Transportation, Marketplaces, E-Commerce, PropTech, Predictive Analytics, FoodTech

name: Augere Health Food Fund
description: AHFF is a venture capital fund that focuses on commercializing knowledge, innovative technologies, and products in the food sector. They support the development of innovative companies in the food industry and those promoting health.
investmentAreas: IT, agri-food sector, foodtech

name: Czysta3.vc
description: Czysta3.vc is a Venture Capital fund in Poland with a global reach, specializing in funding startups and scaling businesses across continents. Founded in 2018, Czysta3.vc is a venture capital firm based in Sleza, Poland. The firm seeks to invest in new technology companies operating in the field of information technology, big data, the internet of things, fintech, mobile, cloud, digital, and e-commerce.
investmentAreas: Deeptech, Fintech, Venture capital, Seed capital, Private equity

name: Avia Capital
description: AVIA Capital is a private equity fund, investing in outstanding companies that offer advanced, good quality products and services. The main aim of AVIA Capital is to invest in Polish enterprises that have the growth potential as well as are oriented towards international expansion. Avia's partners have many years of experience cooperating with international financial and industrial institutions. We have the knowledge and the skills to effectively support the expansion of enterprises into foreign markets. We focus primarily on the B2B sector.
investmentAreas: Electric Vehicles, Energy, Logistics, Manufacturing

name: Aper Ventures
description: In Aper Ventures, we currently focus exclusively on funding: - deep tech solutions at the beginning of commercialisation – at the inflection point where technological risks is in decline (we rarely invest in solely ML solutions) - hardware startups that are scaling up. We co-invest 1-5M EUR in startups. Learn more about our ticket: https://aperventures.com/what-is-deep-tech/ Want to become our portfolio company? Make sure you fit our investment strategy and contact us!
investmentAreas: Manufacturing, IoT, Energy, Semiconductor, DeepTech

name: INventures
description: The mission of INventures is to enable clients to successfully invest in the private market and to support and accelerate the growth of small and medium-sized Polish companies. At INventures, we focus on finding companies with committed management staff and a development idea that we can support with our experience and capital – and by combining competences and finding flexible solutions, we can unleash the company's development and growth potential.
investmentAreas: Finance, fintech

name: Imperio
description: imperio Alternatywna Spółka Inwestycyjna SA is an investment company that conducts investment projects in the area of ​​private equity and venture capital. Imperio ASI SA focuses on the Private Equity/Venture Capital investment market, searching for investment opportunities in the IT, ITC, e-commerce and innovative products and services sectors. As part of the adopted strategy, the Issuer invests directly in business projects and creates smaller special purpose funds together with partners. The main area of ​​activity and functioning of the Company is the implementation and management of investment projects in the form of own investments. Investment projects are capital investments made by acquiring shares and stocks of new projects, taking over already operating companies, as well as the ownership management of these projects.
investmentAreas: IT, ITC, e-commerce and innovative products

name: Augere Open Innovation
description: Augere Health Food Fund Sp. z o.o. (augereventure.pl) is a seed fund dedicated to commercializing innovative technologies and products in the food sector, supporting the development of innovative Polish companies promoting health initiatives. We are constantly looking for innovative solutions that we could support in their commercial implementation on the market ([email protected]). The space in which we operate is mainly the food sector. Our interests include in particular: functional food and modern food products, increasing the efficiency of food production processes, innovative food packaging technologies, improving hygiene standards, pharmaceuticals (OTC) and cosmetics.
investmentAreas: Biotechnology, E-Commerce, Food Processing, Industrial Automation, Industrial Manufacturing, Information Technology

name: SMOK Ventures
description: We are a US venture capital fund investing 100k-1M USD in early stage software startups in Central & Eastern Europe. SMOK Ventures is an early-stage US venture capital fund, investing in software and gaming startups in pre-seed & seed stage in the CEE region. SMOK Ventures is a venture capital firm based in Warsaw, Poland.
investmentAreas: EdTech, AI, SaaS, Game Development, Fintech, Traveltech

name: Next Road Ventures
description: We are a VC fund investing up to €1M in early-stage, B2B SaaS and marketplaces. Our portfolio includes: Aloha Camp, TrustMate, Amberlo, SalesOn, HiPets, Epinote, Sunroof, Ubrania Do Oddania, Heroify, Smart Hotel, Amano and more. Apply for funding via https://app.vestbee.com/org/nextroadventures or send us your pitch deck at [email protected].
investmentAreas: E-Commerce, FinTech, Information and Communications Technology (ICT), Information Technology, Internet, Internet of Things, Marketplace, SaaS, Software

name: SpeedUp Venture Capital Group
description: We are group of funds investing in early stage, yet dynamically developing, ventures with global aspirations. Our cooperation with companies is based on a 3-8 year investment horizon. We're interested in innovations from areas such as: consumer internet, fintech, martech, IoT and hardware.
investmentAreas: Consumer internet, Fintech, Martech, Adtech, Electromobility, Medtech

name: Movens Capital
description: Movens Capital manages VC fund oriented on supporting tech companies focusing on European and the US markets. As VC investors, we mainly invest in seed and series A rounds. The main investment categories that we are looking at are AI-driven companies, fintech, SaaS and platforms (marketplaces) as well as deep tech & industry 4.0. We believe that machine learning will deeply change business environment in coming years. We provide also pragmatic and effective pricing and revenue management solutions through Movens Advisory to seal existing or potential profit leakages and/or improve top line performance.
investmentAreas: Machine Learning, AI, E-Commerce, Healthcare

name: Medi Ventures
description: Medi Ventures is a seed investment VC fund with US capital investing in Poland. Our company is active in the area of Health Care, MedTech and BioTech. We support techological projects with a global market potential.
investmentAreas: Health Care, MedTech and BioTech

name: TDJ
description: TDJ is a Polish family-owned investment firm that for over 45 years has been investing in various enterprises. It has been carrying out its activity in five sectors; Equity, Estate, Finance, Venture, and Foundation. The firm is deeply committed to building and sustaining long-term internal and external partnerships, grounded in its values. Here at TDJ, we measure success in terms of years rather than by quarter to quarter. We are also actively engaged in prosocial activities supporting the education and development of children and teenagers.
investmentAreas: ClimateTech, IndustryTech, Investment Management, Finance

name: JR Holding
description: JR HOLDING is an Alternative Joint-Stock Company listed on the NewConnect Exchange Market in Poland since 2012.In accordance with our strategy, we invest in several key sectors of the future, such as renewable sources of energy, gaming, lifestyle, artificial intelligence, new media or biotech. While creating a business, we believe in more than just good projects or sectors of big potential - we believe in people and realtions.
investmentAreas: Biotechnology, Business Intelligence, Digital Media, Gaming, Hardware, Renewable Energy, SaaS

name: IVE Outdoor
description: IVE are recreational devices for outdoor training for every age group and every user level – from teenagers, through adults and seniors, to professionals. IVE devices use an innovative approach to load regulation, thanks to which adjusting the weight to your training capabilities is extremely simple, fast and safe.
investmentAreas: Fitness, healthtech

name: Pracuj Ventures
description: Pracuj Ventures is an innovation investment fund focused on early stage HR and EDU Tech startups. It is part of Grupa Pracuj, a leading provider of solutions for employee recruitment, retainment, and development with 40,000 clients from 40 countries.

name: Shape VC
description: Shape is a new, Poland-based VC fund investing in early-stage companies with R&D components. We have 18 portfolio companies in the areas of IT, hardware and IoT. We invest up to 250k EUR and work side by side with our founders to help their ideas grow
investmentAreas: AdTech, Robotics, Mobility, Fintech, AI, HRtech

name: Space Bridge
description: Space Bridge Fund is a public-private instrument for financing technologies at an early stage of development, combining private capital investment with a non-refundable public grant. SBF is a BRIdge Alpha fund investing in start-up companies implementing R&D projects in Proof of Concept and Proof of Principle phases.
investmentAreas: engineering, data analysis, environment, artificial intelligence, optoelectronics, and transport sectors

name: Polish Institute for Research and Development
description: PIBiR is a Polish institute supporting technology commercialization and transfer, collaborating with various industry players to drive innovation and success in Poland and globally. We are an investment fund that engages in technology projects at an early stage of development. We invest in entrepreneurial visionaries. We are experts in technology analysis, which makes us see values that others do not see.
investmentAreas: New Materials, Cybersecurity, AI, Robotics, Transport Solutions

name: Podlaski Fundusz Kapitalowy Ltd.
description: Podlaski Fundusz Kapitałowy is a venture capital fund offering direct equity investments and debt financing. With the ability to invest up to 1,500,000 PLN in a single company, they also arrange additional necessary funding for project implementation. Podlaski Fundusz Kapitałowy is one of the oldest venture capital funds operating in Poland. The fund was established as part of the Polish-British Enterprise Development Program in 1995, at a time when the venture capital industry in Poland was just taking its first steps.
investmentAreas: E-Commerce, Robotics, Software, Fintech, Retail

name: KnowledgeHub
description: KnowledgeHub Starter is a Polish venture capital fund that supports startups at the initial stage of development. As a pre-seed fund, we have a very precisely defined moment in which the company should be when we invest in it. We focus on projects from broadly understood areas of MarTech, FinTech, MedTech and DeepTech, but we are eager to meet any founder with their groundbreaking project. Our goal is to support innovative and exceptional entrepreneurs in developing unique technologies with global potential.
investmentAreas: MarTech, FinTech, MedTech, Industry 4.0, SaaS

name: LT Capital
description: At LT Capital we want to find and support the future leaders of that change. Typically, we invest around EUR 250K. If a bigger ticket is needed, we are able to bring top-tier co-investors to the table. With contacts across the globe, we are the bridge between great companies from the CEE and bigger funds and clients from the rest of the world.
investmentAreas: Big Data, AI, Cybersecurity, MedTech, SaaS, E-Commerce

name: nGeno
description: nGeno owns 81,5% in SmartPatch Project. Wearable device "smart patch" to monitor vital body signs (temperature, HR, blood oxygenation, skin pH, hydrogenation). You can stick smart patch to your skin and monitor yourself. It is IoT (BLE) device, medical silicon, is active - battery. Can work also in passive mode.
investmentAreas: Consumer Electronics, Internet of Things, Personal Health, Social

name: Montis Capital Group
description: Montis seeks to work with great teams, scalable business models, innovative and already market validated products on providing for expansion and growth capital within the following two sectors: Industry 4.0 We aim to be at the heart of a Fourth Industrial Revolution by investing into a confluence of robotics, artificial intelligence, internet of things, big data or deep tech. Life Science We look for projects in fields of biotechnology, pharmaceuticals, biomedical technologies, life systems technologies, nutraceuticals, cosmeceuticals, food processing, environmental and biomedical devices.
investmentAreas: Robotics, AI, IoT, Big Data, DeepTech, Life Sciences

name: HardGamma Ventures
description: HardGamma Ventures is a venture capital firm (VC) based in Warsaw, Poland, with a portfolio of investments domestically as well as abroad, including the UK (we are an investor in Techstars London) and the US. HardGamma is managed by a team with extensive experience in starting and developing technology companies as well as strategic business consulting. Hardgamma Ventures is focused on ICT (software, hardware, mobile).
investmentAreas: E-Commerce, EdTech, Marketplaces, Analytics

name: Internet Investment Fund (IIF)
description: IIF SA is a leading early-stage technology fund. IIF invests in IT software development & services, e-commerce, new media and consumer finance projects. The Fund and its staff are behind the success of companies such as Comarch SA (CMR), Wind Mobile SA (WNDM) Moje Rachunki - BillBird SA, Software Mind SA, or Inteligo. IIF supports investments through proper financing and through strong engagement of its knowledge and experience.
investmentAreas: Robotics, Manufacturing, Food Delivery, E-Commerce

name: INNOventure
description: INNOventure is an investment fund managed by Marcin Bielówka and Marcin Molo. It aims to support innovative scientists, engineers, and entrepreneurs in developing and commercializing their projects. INNOventure supplies the initial capital, connects the founders with experienced professionals to provide mentorship, and helps to develop the projects so they are attractive to customers and next round investors. The capital comes from a combination of public and private funds - INNOventure cooperates with several partners to supply funds for further development.
investmentAreas: Medtech, AI, HealthTech, Computer Vision

name: Inovo VC
description: Inovo Venture Partners backs early-stage, post-traction startups from Poland and the CEE region with up to €3M of initial investment, and helps them build global brands while driving growth of the local startup ecosystem. We take great pride in being close to top founders who think big. We are the fund of choice for the most ambitious Polish & CEE founders - just ask any of our portfolio companies whether they'd recommend working with us... or see a short testimonial below: "If I'd start a new startup, I would ask Inovo to be my first VC investor again." - Stefan Batory, Booksy.
investmentAreas: Developer Tools, AI/Machine Learning, Data Science, Healthcare, SaaS, B2C, B2B

name: Firlej Kastory
description: Firlej Kastory is a family investment firm focused on investments in global technology companies, specifically in the energy, financial, risk governance and health sectors. We are an international group based in Warsaw. Our focus is to preserve and increase wealth by achieving long-term returns coupled with a positive social and cultural impact. The firm activity is based on a strong commitment to professional excellence, moral integrity, personal trust, and confidentiality.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Cyber Security, E-Commerce, Energy, Enterprise Software, Financial Services

name: AgriTech Hub
description: AgriTech Hub is a Venture Capital Fund with investment interests in modern solutions within the scope of high-tech for the agriculture and food sector. We aim to put R&D projects with the most potential to commercial use during Proof of Concept (PoC) and Proof of Principle (PoP) stages. We invest in solutions and technology within the scope of the entire value added chain in agriculture and agricultural practice. AgriTech Hub constitutes an amalgamation of knowledge in terms of high-tech and ICT with the investment experience of a team of experts. Our mission is to support innovation, applicable at the growing, production and distribution stages, all the way to the commercial end customer. MIT Enterprise Forum Poland has been supporting the fund since its inception.
investmentAreas: Agriculture, AgTech, Animal Feed, Equestrian, Farming, Forestry

name: ARIA Fund
description: ARIA is a growth VC fund investing in tech European scale ups . We focus on early growth, post-product, high-tech scale ups that are developing unique technologies. We actively support our portfolio companies in a wide range of issues related to further business growth.
investmentAreas: Big Data, Cybersecurity, Semiconductor, EdTech, Analytics

name: Arkley Brinc VC
description: Arkley Brinc provides venture capital for early-stage tech startups in Poland (or European entities with Polish operations), with a focus on IoT and hardware-enabled technologies. In addition to funding, we offer over a decade of first-hand experience in business and product development, and a network that reaches deep into Silicon Valley and the Greater Bay region in China. Arkley Brinc VC is proud to be part of the PFR Starter FIZ fund from PFR Ventures, and to have Group One as our LP.
investmentAreas: Clean Energy, Hardware, Health Care, Industrial, Internet of Things, Robotics

name: Bitspiration Booster
description: Bitspiration Booster is a VC fund investing in early-stage science and technology ventures startups based in the Central and Eastern Europe (CEE) region. We recognize that innovation is not evenly distributed, invest in global collaboration and partnerships, and provide long-term support from our team of experienced operator-investors. Founded in 2016, ASI Bitspiration Booster is a venture capital firm based in Kraków, Poland.
investmentAreas: AgTech, CleanTech, BioTech, HealthTech

name: Black Pearls VC
description: Black Pearls VC is a venture capital firm investing in leading tech startups with a focus on Life Quality Technologies, supporting ambitious entrepreneurs to build global companies in areas like Digital Health and Enterprise Software.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Enterprise Software, FinTech, Health Care, Life Science

name: CofounderZone
description: CofounderZone stands for ecosystem, where two coexisting worlds can find common ground to cooperate. The blue ocean is represented by innovative enterprises, utilising groundbreaking technologies and non-linear business models, but lacking resources to scale. The red ocean is the opposite world, dominated by corporations, struggling to maintain their position, despite being equipped with abundance of knowledge and assets.
investmentAreas: E-Commerce, SaaS, Pharma, EdTech

name: Experior Venture Fund
description: Experior Venture Fund is the leading early and growth stage venture capital investor in Poland. EVF invests between EUR 200k and EUR 3m in high-growth innovative companies that are driving transformative change in their industries. The firm has a dedicated team of professionals who support entrepreneurs in delivering success. Support of Experior Venture Fund is tailored towards the specific needs of each portfolio company, the fund provides a combination of both capital/financing and operational know-how driving value creation of portfolio companies.
investmentAreas: MedTech, Life Sciences, Healthtech, Retail
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Expeditions Fund
description: Expeditions Fund is a long-term and patient venture capital fund investing in early-stage technology companies globally led by mission-driven founders. The fund initially started as venture capital operations of Firlej Kastory family office. In 2021, Firlej Kastory expanded beyond immediate family management and the venture capital firm, Expeditions Fund, was created. Expeditions Fund today is an independent venture fund backed by multi-billion dollar investors, family offices, founders, and CEOs of successful companies.
investmentAreas: Cybersecurity, SaaS, Machine Learning, Fintech, Biotech

name: PGE Ventures
description: PGE Ventures is a CVC fund within the PGE Capital Group, which was established to invest in startups. The fund will invest in startups connected to energy value chain in order to gain financial and strategic leverage. We offer both the financial support and the know-how transfer in terms of PGE Group’s operations. We understand the needs of young entrepreneurs and we can address them in a professional manner.
investmentAreas: Financial services, Funds, Investment, Consulting
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Pracuj Ventures
description: Pracuj Ventures focuses on investment in the early-stage human resources and learning and development technology startups. Founded by Grupa Pracuj, an innovation investment fund focused on early-stage HR and EDU Tech startups.

fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: IZDAT
description: Our background spans over 20 years of international experience in the IT-outsourcing industry. Our global team, empowered by extensive expertise of its every member, combined with abundant resources and a thriving entrepreneurial culture, is totally equipped to tackle the challenges - from all angles.
investmentAreas: AgTech, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Biotechnology, FinTech, Human Resources, InsurTech
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Qemetica Ventures (Formerly Ciech Ventures)

We invest globally in early-stage ventures related to ChemTech, New Materials, Circular Economy, AgroTech, and CleanTech.

name: PGNiG Ventures

In our investment activity, we focus on companies that offer unique products or services, are in possession of exceptional know-how, have a robust business model in place, are run by a strong management team and make every effort to become leaders in their respective markets.

name: EEC Ventures

The company provides IT solutions for artificial intelligence, industrial cybersecurity, blockchain, and big data. It also provides target companies with both early-stage and growth/expansion capital financing. They create value using sustainable resources, lower the environmental burden or provide higher efficiency in the utilization of traditional resources.

We provide energy and fuel to over 100 million Europeans, and our advanced products are available in nearly 90 countries on 6 continents.

Alior Bank provides service to over 4 million clients, including nearly 200 thousand businesses. Alior Bank has been part of the WIG20 index for the largest and most liquid companies listed on the Warsaw Stock Exchange since 2014.
investmentAreas: FinTech, InsurTech, Financial Services, Artificial Intelligence

We collaborate with corporations, which are looking for innovative solutions and are ready to experiment with new technologies.

What counts for us is a talented team, market opportunity and competitive landscape. Very open to co-invest and cooperate with accelerators/incubators. Our program is therefore aimed at startupers, or rather future startupers, who would like to implement their innovative business ideas.

name: Startup Spark
description: Startup Spark is a project that combines creative startups with the infrastructure and resources of large enterprises. Startup Spark is an innovative project created at the Łódź Special Economic Zone S.A. in cooperation with a team experienced in acceleration, which aims to connect creative startups with the infrastructure and resources of large enterprises. We effectively connect big business with startups!

name: StartUp HUB Poland
description: StartUp HUB Poland is an innovation HUB for high-tech startups from central-east europe. We develop the high-tech innovation ecosystem of CEE with Poland. SHP hosts, guides and pre-incubates innovative startups from Poland and abroad.

name: StartUp HUB Poland
description: StartUp HUB Poland is an innovation HUB for high-tech startups from central-east europe. We develop the high-tech innovation ecosystem of CEE with Poland. SHP hosts, guides and pre-incubates innovative startups from Poland and abroad.

Gdansk-based acceleration programme bringing startups to the global level! Well-know experts, investors and entrepreneurs, workshops and networking, knowledge and funding.

name: Orange Fab Poland
description: Gateway between Orange Polska and startups. Orange Fab is an acceleration program for start-ups. We have been cooperating continuously since 2015. We are looking for start-ups with innovative projects and we offer both business and technical support in the implementation of the pilot projects, as well as a package of additional benefits.

name: Space3ac

Acceleration program bringing together large business and startups that provide them with innovative solutions.

name: Nextgrid

The future of software is in intelligent applications powered by AI and it is happening right now!

We have startups in the field of medtech, digital health, biotech, environment protection.

name: MIT Enterprise Forum Central & Eastern Europe

We are open to all participants of the entrepreneurial ecosystem.
investmentAreas: Entrepreneurship, VCs, Startups, Science, IP

name: Poland Prize
description: Poland Prize is a grant program that supports foreign startups to grow and develop their businesses in Poland. Poland Prize is a grant program designed to encourage foreign startups to do business in Poland by providing them with support across the entire process.
investmentAreas: Finance, Incubators, Venture Capital, Investments

name: RBL_START
description: RBL_START is an accelerator program that invests in cybersecurity startups. What about changing the rules for creating innovations? RBL_ is here to develop cutting-edge technologies, inspire innovations, and elevate our startup partners! Develop and scale your business in cooperation with the RBL_START accelerator.
investmentAreas: Innovation, Bank, Cooperation, Collaboration, Research

name: ReaktorX
description: ReaktorX is an old-fashioned villa based in Å»oliborz, Warsaw where startups and freelance developers work, collaborate, and network. ReaktorX is an acceleration program for founders with global ambitions. The CEE Acceleration program is for founders who think globally and want to take over the world with their startups.
investmentAreas: B2B, Business Development, Coworking, Enterprise, Non Profit

name: Unsung Heroes Acceleration Programme
description: Unsung Heroes is a global humanitarian-technology accelerator program that aims to support and empower startups with innovative solutions that can contribute to humanitarian missions worldwide.The program seeks to identify and support startups that are working on technologies, products, or services that can help solve global humanitarian
investmentAreas: Business Development, Finance, Financial Services, Humanitarian, Non Profit

name: KPT Scaleup
description: KPT ScaleUp is an acceleration program helping the development of companies with solutions in the area of an Industry. We support the development of foreign startups which want to expand their business to the Polish market. A company established in Poland should operate as a capital company, in which at least half of the shares are held by persons who are not Polish citizens, and at least one member of the company's management board is not a Polish citizen.
investmentAreas: Acceleration, Technology, Consulting, Coaching, Training

name: HardGamma Consulting
description: Management consultancy and seed investor. hardGamma Consulting (UBIK Business Consulting) is a management consultancy boutique for TMT companies and technology start-ups, advising its Clients on business strategy definition and execution as well as on acquiring financing. Thanks to the unique combination of business and technology skills we are a perfect partner for the projects in the high-tech sector.
investmentAreas: Consulting, Investor, Financing, Funding

name: Huge Thing
description: HugeThing is an intensive acceleration programme for the high potential teams with global ambitions. Huge Thing helps corporations discover their inner face of innovation. We support companies at every stage of the process of acquiring innovation – from setting the framework and strategies of innovation teams, through support in the implementation of programs and initiatives whose goal is to acquire and create innovations that meet their needs.
investmentAreas: Seed funding, Business acceleration, Business mentoring, Financial Services

name: Cobin Angels
description: Cobin Angels is a business angel community. COBIN Angels is the largest professional club of business angels in Poland. Since 2015, COBIN has supported private investors in making investments in young, fast-growing technology companies from Poland and the Central European region.
investmentAreas: Investment, Business Angels Networks, Investors, Private Equity, Innovation

name: 3x Capital Fund
description: Our fund invests in exceptional founders and helps them to succeed in the blockchain ecosystem. 3x Capital is an investment and advisory firm focused on seed-stage web3 startups. With over 6 years of investment experience in equity and tokens, 45 investments with 25 exits, and 5 years of expertise in portfolio management, early-stage investments, and startups, we are committed to supporting great teams with impactful ideas and early-stage products.
investmentAreas: Crypto Currency, Investments, Advisory, Blockchain

name: Accelpoint
description: Accelpoint is a smart tech accelerator that has been operating successfully in the CEE region. Accelpoint is an International Partner of the Singapore Fintech Festival and host of the European Fintech Hackcelerator. We are also proud Partner of The British Embassy in Warsaw. AccelPoint is a leading technology accelerator & investment ecosystem operating in CEE and scaling startups globally.
investmentAreas: Investment Management, Sustainability, FinTech, CleanTech

name: Akcelerator Innowacji NOT
description: Akcelerator Innowacji NOT is a company that helps entrepreneurs to develop and execute the ideas that they have for a business. Akcelerator Innowacji NOT (AI NOT) is a Polish Seed Found, established in 2009 together by Polish Federation of Engineering Association - NOT and SATUS Venture Found. We offer 2 stage support for startups and innovative projects: incubation and seed found investment round up to 200.000 Euro. For projects with higher financial needs we provide second investment round with SATUS Venture.
investmentAreas: Incubation, Mentoring, Seed fouding, Startup, Venture Capital

name: ALMA SA
description: ALMA SA integrates ICT systems, telecommunication systems, building automation systems, and industrial automation systems. Alma SA is a leading IT integrator specializing in DWDM, LAN, WAN solutions, cybersecurity including quantum key exchange (QKD) and quantum number generators (QNG). The company successfully conducts research projects related to cybersecurity of industrial networks based on artificial intelligence and machine learning.
investmentAreas: IT Services, IT Consulting, Cybersecurity, Information Technology

name: Apollo Capital
description: We support European companies (including start-ups) which plan to expand their business to the United States. We introduce companies to the US market and build a large scale of their business. The GDP of the United States is greater than the GDP of all European Union countries combined. It is as if your product were available on the shelves of all stores, in all EU countries.
investmentAreas: Business Consulting, Business Service, Financial service, FinTech

name: Arkley Brinc VC
description: Rocket Fuel for Tech Trailblazers. Arkley Brinc provides venture capital funding & support to early-stage tech startups in Poland. Arkley Brinc provides venture capital for early-stage tech startups in Poland (or European entities with Polish operations), with a focus on IoT and hardware-enabled technologies. In addition to funding, we offer over a decade of first-hand experience in business and product development, and a network that reaches deep into Silicon Valley and the Greater Bay region in China.
investmentAreas: Investment Fund, Accelerator, Venture Capital, Angel Investing, IoT

name: Binkplus Incubator
description: Binkplus Incubator assists entrepreneurs with starting and growing new business ideas and technology ventures. Bink+ is a process designed to accelerate the successful development of startup ideas and entrepreneurial companies. Bink+ methodology will inspire and engage participants in the fundamental concepts of entrepreneurship in the early stages of business development.
investmentAreas: Funding, Finance, Staffing, Financial Services
